attributes.action: Not to recommend that Michael Martin be elevated to the House of Lords. That would be reward for failure, something the PM said should not happen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has lost his job because of imcompetence. He is now to be recommended to be elevated to the House of Lords, in essence, reward for failure. This is something the PM insisted should not happen for bankers, so why is it okay for politicians?

rejection.details: This matter was subject to a Commons vote and is now the decision of the Queen.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
